LanguageData.Wiki.HiddenWarning: {0} pages are hidden due to spoiler settings.
LanguageData.Wiki.ShowMenuBarButtonDesc: When enabled, a wiki button is added to the bottom of the game screen.
LanguageData.Wiki.ShowInspectorButtonDesc: When enabled, any item that has a corresponding wiki page displays a button to open that page in the inspection window.\nRequires a game restart to take effect.
